Queries.InsertBulkUploadData: INSERT INTO crudoperation.bulkuploadtable (UserName, EmailID, MobileNumber, Age, Salary, Gender) VALUES (@UserName, @EmailID, @MobileNumber, @Age, @Salary, @Gender);
Queries.ReadRecord: SELECT DISTINCT UserId, UserName, EmailID, MobileNumber, Gender, Age, Salary, IsActive, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM crudoperation.bulkuploadtable) AS TotalRecord FROM crudoperation.bulkuploadtable LIMIT @Offset, @RecordPerPage;
